references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
V. Thébault, Les Récréations Mathématiques. Gauthier-Villars, Paris, 1952, p. 95.
mathematica: Table[BaseForm[n^2,8],{n,5!}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, May 12 2010 *)Table[FromDigits[IntegerDigits[n^2, 8]], {n, 60}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 15 2015 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [Seqint(Intseq(n^2, 8)): n in [1..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 16 2015(PARI) a(n)=fromdigits(digits(n^2,8)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 25 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Sep 08 2000
